Above and Below.Description: When you pair up with a differently sized ally, your foes have little chance to dodge your attacks.

Adaptive Fighting.Description: Once per day as a move action, gain the benefit of a combat feat you don’t have

Add Leverage.Description: Grip your weapon with more hands to move foes farther with combat maneuvers

Advance Warning.Description: Shout a warning to your allies, causing them to stop being flat-footed

Advanced Melee Weapon Proficiency.Description: No penalty to attacks with advanced melee weapons

Ambuscade.Description: When you make an attack in the surprise round against a target that has not yet acted, gain a bonus to attacks and damage

Ambush Awareness.Description: If you fail the Perception check to act in the surprise round, you can still take a full defense action

Amplified Glitch.Description: Disrupt devices, causing targets to become shaken for 1 round or more

Back to Back.Description: You aren’t as easy to hit when surrounded.

Basic Melee Weapon Proficiency.Description: Gain proficiency with basic melee weapons

Blood in Their Eyes.Description: Your critical hits with slashing attacks make foes dazzled

Bodyguard.Description: Add a +2 bonus to an adjacent ally’s AC as a reaction

Cleave.Description: Make an additional melee attack if the first one hits

Clever Retort.Description: You always have a witty remark or comeback ready at your adversaries’ expense.

Close Combat.Description: Gain a +2 bonus to AC against ranged attacks when are in melee combat

Combat Casting.Description: +2 bonus to AC and saves against attacks of opportunity when casting spells

Constant Alert.Description: Reroll your initiative check and automatically win ties

Cook Grenade.Description: Time your release of a grenade to increase its effectiveness

Coordinated Shot.Description: Allies gain a +1 bonus to ranged attacks against foes you threaten

Crescendo of Victory.Description: Your perfect musical cues can accentuate a moment of triumph and send a surge of adrenaline through an ally.

Crescendo of Violence.Description: Your skill with modulating the sounds of your sonic weapons into musical patterns borders on showboating but also inspires your allies.

Deadly Aim.Description: Take a −2 penalty to weapon attacks to deal extra damage

Defensive Striker.Prerequisites: Dex 13, base attack bonus +1, armor training trait
Defensive Striker.Description: You were born to fight your enemies, and nobody does it better.

Deflect Projectiles.Description: Spend 1 Resolve Point to attempt to avoid a ranged attack

Dire Straits.Description: Stabilize when you have no Hit Points or Resolve Points left

Discordant Din.Description: By aiming carefully, you can cause your sonic weapons to emit a terrible noise on impact, aggravating the senses of creatures that rely heavily on hearing.

Dive for Cover.Description: Fall prone in an adjacent square to roll a Reflex save twice

Double Draw.Description: Your limbs allow you to manipulate multiple weapons

Double Tap.Prerequisites: Weapon Focus (small arms), proficiency with small arms
Double Tap.Description: Expend double the normal ammunition to gain bonuses to attack and damage with a small arm

Drag Down.Description: When you are tripped, you can attempt to trip an adjacent foe

Far Shot.Description: Reduce penalty due to range increments

Focused Spellcaster.Prerequisites: Combat Casting, ability to cast 4th-level spells
Focused Spellcaster.Description: Spend a resolve point to successfully cast a spell after you take damage during the casting

Fouling Reposition.Description: Reposition a foe to throw it and another creature off balance

Fusillade.Prerequisites: Base attack bonus +1, four or more arms
Fusillade.Description: Make an automatic-mode attack with multiple small arms

Goad.Prerequisites: Antagonize or Quick Quip, Diplomacy 5 ranks
Goad.Description: You know how to keep your foes flustered and infuriated.

Grab Attention.Description: Make a foe you hit in melee off-target when attacking anyone other than you

Grappler Pull.Description: Use a grappler to draw your foes closer to you

Great Cleave.Description: Make an additional melee attack after each melee attack that hits

Greater Feint.Description: Foes you feint against are flat-footed for 1 round

Grenade Mastery.Description: Increase the saving throw DCs of grenades you use

Ground Fighting.Description: Ignore penalties to unarmed attacks when grappled, pinned, or prone

Harmony of Bullets.Description: When wielding multiple sonic weapons, you can modulate their frequencies to allow them to musically amplify each other when operated together.

Heavy Weapon Proficiency.Prerequisites: Str 13, proficiency with longarms and small arms

Improved Combat Maneuver.Description: +4 bonus to perform one combat maneuver

Improved Critical.Description: The DC to resist the critical effects of your critical hits increases by 2

Improved Feint.Description: Use Bluff to feint as a move action

Improved Sidestep.Prerequisites: Dex 17, Mobility or trick attack class feature, Sidestep

Improved Stand Still.Description: +4 bonus to melee attacks with Stand Still

Improved Supporting Fire.Description: Your ranged attacks provide better support for your allies.

Improved Unarmed Strike.Description: Deal more damage and threaten squares with unarmed strikes

In Harm’s Way.Description: Take the damage of a successful attack against an adjacent ally

Instant Crater.Description: Weapons with the explode special property create difficult terrain

Jet Charge.Description: Boost your charge attacks with jets to move farther

Kasathan Battle Dance.Prerequisites: Prerequisites: Dex 13, Mobility or trick attack
Kasathan Battle Dance.Description: Avoid all attacks of opportunity when you withdraw

Kip Up.Description: Stand from prone as a swift action

Laugh at Danger.Description: Grant an ally a +2 morale bonus to AC as a reaction when you take Hit Point damage

Living Ladder.Description: Hit an adjacent foe with an unarmed attack to stand and possibly knock them prone

Lung Puncture.Description: Your critical hits with piercing weapons cause foes to be fatigued

Lunge.Description: Increase reach of melee attacks by 5 feet until the end of your turn

Many-Handed Master.Description: You use your many limbs to counter combat maneuvers

Massive Splash.Description: You can batter the water’s surface to create a huge sheet of water that temporarily conceals you from your foes.

Melt Defenses.Description: On a critical hit, cause further attacks against a foe to target EAC

Mobility.Description: +4 bonus to AC against attacks of opportunity from movement

Momentous Attack.Description: On a melee critical hit, move 5 feet

Morphing Feint.Description: Your sudden change of appearance creates an opening for an attack

Multi-Weapon Fighting.Description: Reduce the penalty for full attacks when using multiple small arms or operative melee weapons

Mystic Strike.Description: Melee and ranged attacks count as magic

Nimble Moves.Description: Ignore 20 feet of difficult terrain when you move

Opening Volley.Description: +2 bonus to a melee attack against a target you damaged with a ranged attack

Parting Shot.Prerequisites: Dex 15, Mobility, Shot on the Run, base attack bonus +6
Parting Shot.Description: Make a single ranged attack when withdrawing

Penetrating Attack.Description: Reduce enemy's DR and energy resistance against your weapons by 5

Pinpoint Hurler.Description: Reduce the distance your thrown weapons travel when they miss

Powered Armored Proficiency.Prerequisites: Str 13, proficiency with light armor and heavy armor, base attack bonus +5

Pull the Pin.Description: Perform a disarm to activate a foe’s grenade

Quick Draw.Description: Draw a weapon as a swift action

Quick Quip.Description: You infuriate foes with a witty remark or retort.

Reflect Projectiles.Description: Spend 1 Resolve Point to attempt to redirect a ranged attack

Ricochet Grenade.Prerequisites: Proficiency with grenades, base attack bonus +7
Ricochet Grenade.Description: Bounce a grenade off a wall to reach difficult spo

Sacred Strike.Prerequisites: Worship a deity of an alignment within one step of your own
Sacred Strike.Description: Treat your attacks as having your deity’s alignment

Shelter Ally.Prerequisites: Bodyguard, natural reach of 10 feet or more
Shelter Ally.Description: Use Bodyguard to protect allies within reach and increase the bonus and penalty by 1 when protecting a smaller creature

Shield Block.Description: Spent 1 Resolve Point as a reaction to reduce damage from area effects

Shot on the Run.Description: Make a ranged attack at any point during movement

Sidestep.Prerequisites: Dex 15, Mobility or trick attack class feature
Sidestep.Description: Take guarded step as a reaction when a foe misses you with melee attack

Slam Down.Description: Your critical hits with bludgeoning weapons knock down your foes

Slippery Shooter.Description: +3 bonus to AC against attacks of opportunity when making ranged attacks

Solid Stance.Description: Become harder to move, and use a reaction to avoid being knocked prone

Special Weapon Proficiency.Prerequisites: Proficiency with basic melee weapons or small arms
Special Weapon Proficiency.Description: Gain proficiency with one special weapon

Spring Attack.Description: Move before and after a melee attack

Spry Cover.Description: Covering fire grants a +4 bonus to an ally’s Acrobatics check to tumble

Stand Still.Description: Make an attack of opportunity to stop a foe’s movement

Stand Strong.Description: When you plant yourself in place, you’re difficult to move past.

Step Up.Description: Take a guarded step as a reaction to an adjacent foe moving

Step Up and Strike.Prerequisites: Dex 13, Step Up, base attack bonus +6
Step Up and Strike.Description: Make an attack of opportunity as part of Step Up

Strike Back.Description: Ready an action to make a melee attack against a foe with reach

Superheated Spells.Prerequisites: Ability to cast spells, Mysticism 5 ranks
Superheated Spells.Description: Your particular brand of fire magic can superheat air or water instead of producing fire, allowing your spells to remain effective underwater.

Suppressive Fire.Prerequisites: Base attack bonus +1, proficiency with heavy weapons
Suppressive Fire.Description: Provide covering fire or harrying fire in an area

Tandem Feint.Description: You can work with an ally to place your foes off-balance.

Tandem Maneuver.Prerequisites: Base attack bonus +6, Improved Combat Maneuver (any)
Tandem Maneuver.Description: You can work in concert with an ally to perform maneuvers in combat.

Target of Opportunity.Description: You take advantage of a foe’s slipup.

Terrifying Presence.Description: Your fearsome displays instill fear longer

Tripping Rush.Prerequisites: Improved Combat Maneuver (trip), base attack bonus +5
Tripping Rush.Description: Knock a target prone when you bull rush them into an obstacle

Unbreakable Will.Prerequisites: Telepathy or limited telepathy racial trait
Unbreakable Will.Description: Your telepathy grants you an unparalleled strength of mind.

Underwater Brawler.Description: Even underwater, you can leverage your strength to devastating effect.

Unfriendly Fire.Description: Trick an attacker into shooting at another enemy adjacent to you

Unsinkable Caster.Prerequisites: Ability to cast spells, character level 3rd
Unsinkable Caster.Description: You tap into your inner focus, allowing you to cast spells even in dire situations.

Versatile Fighting.Description: Spend RP to use Adaptive Fighting more often in a day

Versatile Focus.Description: +1 bonus to attack rolls with all weapon types you are proficient with

Versatile Specialization.Description: Deal extra damage with all weapon types you are proficient with

Weapon Focus.Description: +1 bonus to attack rolls with selected weapon type

Weapon Specialization.Prerequisites: Character level 3rd, proficiency with selected weapon type
Weapon Specialization.Description: Deal extra damage with selected weapon type
